synopsis.text: Kazuya’s life is far from ordinary, as he finds himself the center of attention for a group of magical girls, all vying for his affection. Just when their rivalry reaches new heights, an unexpected arrival turns the situation even more chaotic. Emerging from a rocket, a mysterious woman introduces herself as Kazuya's affluent fiancée from the future! As the girls intensify their efforts to win Kazuya's heart, they must also confront a sinister new adversary who exploits their internal conflicts and threatens to steal their innocence. Prepare for a whirlwind of romantic comedy, magical battles, and unexpected twists in this thrilling anime adventure!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
